recipes.name: Quinoa Power Bowl
recipes.description: A nutritious bowl packed with quinoa, salmon, and fresh vegetables
instructions: Rinse quinoa under cold water until water runs clear
Cook quinoa in vegetable broth for 15 minutes until fluffy
Season salmon fillet with salt, pepper, and lemon juice
Pan-sear salmon for 4-5 minutes per side until cooked through
Massage kale leaves with a little olive oil to soften
Assemble bowl with quinoa as base, top with kale, salmon, and avocado
Drizzle with lemon-tahini dressing if desired

recipes.name: Simple Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Quick and healthy breakfast with mashed avocado on toast
instructions: Toast bread slices until golden brown
Mash avocado in a bowl with a fork
Season mashed avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice
Spread avocado mixture evenly on toast
Optional: top with cherry tomatoes or a poached egg

recipes.name: Kale Smoothie
recipes.description: Green smoothie with kale and banana for a healthy start
instructions: Wash kale leaves thoroughly and remove stems
Add kale, banana, and liquid to blender
Blend on high speed for 60-90 seconds until smooth
Add ice if desired for a colder drink
Pour into glass and serve immediately
